channel.title: How do you create commands popup
channel.description:
I don't know how to create a commands popup that it will the commands
Like when you say ::commands and something popups! HOW DO YOU CREATE?
Look Below!
[IMG]http://i893.photobucket.com/albums/ac135/ZezimaWoW/oa.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i893.photobucket.com/albums/ac135/ZezimaWoW/oa1.jpg[/img]

item.title: How do you create commands popup
item.dc:creator: @blitz_ags blitz ags
item.description:
@blitz_ags wrote:

Erm this should go to Server Help… anyway here,

My ::commands just edit it for your own.

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("commands") && (playerRights >= 0)) { String name = command.substring(5); sendQuest("@gre@Divine Paradise's Players Commands Guide.", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("", 8146); sendQuest("@blu@Players Commands", 8147); sendQuest("", 8148); sendQuest("::pure", 8149); sendQuest("::donorpoints", 8150); sendQuest("::lock", 8151); sendQuest("::unlock", 8152); sendQuest("::staffcommands", 8153); sendQuest("::donatorcommands", 8154); sendQuest("::fcguide", 8155); sendQuest("::players", 8156); sendQuest("::max", 8157); sendQuest("::alchs", 8158); sendQuest("::mypks", 8159); sendQuest("::changepassword", 8160); sendQuest("::yell", 8161); sendQuest("::rules", 8162); sendQuest("", 8163); sendQuest("", 8164); sendQuest("", 8165); sendQuest("", 8166); sendQuest("", 8167); sendQuest("", 8168); sendQuest("", 8169); sendQuest("", 8170); sendQuest("", 8171); sendQuest("", 8172); sendQuest("", 8173); sendQuest("", 8174); sendQuest("", 8175); sendQuest("", 8176); sendQuest("", 8177); sendQuest("", 8178); sendQuest("", 8179); sendQuest("", 8180); sendQuest("", 8181); sendQuest("", 8182); sendQuest("", 8183); sendQuest("", 8184); sendQuest("", 8185); sendQuest("", 8186); sendQuest("", 8187); sendQuest("", 8188); sendQuest("", 8189); sendQuest("", 8190); sendQuest("", 8191); sendQuest("", 8192); sendQuest("", 8193); sendQuest("", 8194); sendQuest("", 8195); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }
